CONTACT_FORM_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Capture Your Screen, Share Your Vision
CONTACT_FORM_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Have questions or need support? We're here to help you snap the perfect screenshot!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Capture Your Screen, Elevate Your Content
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Create stunning screenshots effortlessly with our intuitive app. Perfect for tutorials, presentations, and social media sharing.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Snap screenshots with a single click or keyboard shortcut, capturing exactly what you see on your screen.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Choose between full-screen, window, or custom area captures to get precisely the image you need.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Crop, annotate, and highlight your screenshots instantly with our built-in editor.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Share your screenshots directly to social media, cloud storage, or via link with just a few taps.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Automatically tag and categorize your screenshots for effortless retrieval when you need them.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Access your screenshots across all your devices with seamless cloud synchronization.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Get answers to common queries about our screenshot app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How do I capture a screenshot using this app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Simply open the app, select the capture mode (full screen, window, or custom area), and click the capture button. The app will automatically save your screenshot.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: Can I edit my screenshots after capturing them?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: Yes! Our app includes a built-in editor where you can crop, add text, highlight areas, and apply filters to your screenshots before saving or sharing.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Is it possible to capture scrolling screenshots?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Absolutely. Our app features a scrolling capture mode that allows you to take full-page screenshots of websites or long documents with ease.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: How can I share my screenshots directly from the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: After capturing and editing your screenshot, tap the share button to instantly send it via email, messaging apps, or social media platforms integrated with our app.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Does the app support multiple monitors?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, our app fully supports multi-monitor setups. You can capture screenshots from any connected display or even combine screens for panoramic shots.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I capture a screenshot using this app?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Simply open our app, select the area you want to capture, and click the 'Capture' button. It's that easy!
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Can I edit my screenshots after capturing them?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes! Our app includes basic editing tools like cropping, adding text, and highlighting. You can enhance your screenshots right after taking them.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Is it possible to capture scrolling screenshots?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app supports scrolling screenshots, allowing you to capture entire webpages or long documents in one image.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How can I share my screenshots?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: After capturing, you can instantly share your screenshots via email, messaging apps, or social media platforms directly from within our app.
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_1: Capture your entire screen with a single click

PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_5: Automatically save and access your screenshots in the cloud
PLACEHOLDER_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_6: Access your screenshots across all your devices
